revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = Touchstone DG3450 Data Gateway |caption2 = DOCSIS 3.1 Gateway with 802.11ac Wi-Fi & MoCA 2.0 |pp = http://www.arris.com/products/touchstone-dg3450-cable-gateway |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Arris_DG3450 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Arris |model = DG3450 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC22002R |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, cable modem |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = UIDDG3450 |icid = 6670A-DG3450 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = ARCT04719 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Puma;FHCE2752M; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.5 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML04G200TFI00; |flash1size = 512 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC2G63GFR-RDA; |ram1_num = 4 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Intel;PEB7085M; |cm_down_c = 32 |cm_up_c = 8 |docsisver = 3.1 |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.1 (Gen1), |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = DOCSIS 3.1, MoCA 2.0, TR-069, battery backup, |addchip = 2.4GHz RF Front End Module;Qorvo (RFMD);RFFM4252;Q, 4252, QPK2;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85720-11;SKY, 720, 20001;4; ,,, DOCSIS 3.1 Cable Receiver (Tuner);MaxLinear;MxL236;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = ARRIS - XXXX, ARRIS - XXXX-5G, |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 08/02/2017 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Celeno;CL2440;Celeno, CL2440, 1640, P00000003; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Celeno;CL2432; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "DG3450A" and "ARCT04719 REV C" are silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Arris TG3442|Arris TG3452}}
2x192 MHz OFDM in the downstream and 2x96MHz OFDMA in the upstream along with 32x8 channel bonding.
===Specifications=== "Multi Processor Technology with ARM and ATOM based Application Processor" :CPU: [[Intel Puma]] 7 - FHCE2752M (SR31B) @2.5GHz Dual Core :WLAN: [[Celeno]] CL2440 (4T4R AC) + [[Celeno]] CL2432 (3T3R N)
==Links of Interest== [http://www.arris.com/globalassets/resources/data-sheets/touchstone-dg3450-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
